Hello dear user. Here are some tips about what you can do with the PDFSearch app.

If you are usually dealing with pdf files on your phone, this app is tailored for you.
You can search one word or multiple words (seperated with comma) in a pdf file.
You can search for a sentence in a pdf gile.
You can search one word or multiple words (seperated with comma) in multiple pdf files together.
The search is carried out page by page.
This app is designed to be simple and useful and it does not require internet connection.

This app is not designed to view pdf files, it is designed to search inside them.
This app is not designed to search pdf files in your phone or on the internet.
This app does not open pdf files on the internet.
This app may not be able read the content of all the pdf files correctly, since pdf files may be read protected.
